title: Shanti Knows What Scarlett Did | American Horror Stories - Episode 2: "Rubber (Wo)man - Part Two"
author: AHS Crave
comment: Love Scarlett in that rubber suit.
This Is Dillon Scarlett Was Trying To Tell Her Best Friend Shanti That What Is Going On In Her House Is Not Safe and Scarlett Was Trying To Protect Her Best Friend Shanti

This Is Dillon Not Only Scarlett Winslow Become a Psychopath and Possessed While Wearing The Black Latex SM Rubbersuit She Didn't Want Shanti To Get Hurt Or Killed Since Scarlett Does Care About Shanti
This Is Dillon I Like Scarlett In The Rubbersuit Myself She Looks Hot
description:
Shanti (Belissa Escobedo) reveals that she suspects Scarlett (Sierra McCormick) of murdering Maya (Paris Jackson) & her friends after they publicly humiliated her. Scarlett walks away, at which point the ghosts of the dead girls threaten to kill Shanti, until Ruby (Kaia Gerber) stops them.
